1.2.1.name: wordpress/intuitive-custom-post-order
1.2.1.description:
Intuitively, Order Items (Posts, Pages, and Custom Post Types) using a Drag and Drop Sortable JavaScript. Configuration is unnecessary. You can do directly on default WordPress administration.

Excluding Custom Query which uses 'order' or 'orderby' parameters, in query_posts()', 'WP_Query()', and 'get_posts'.
